description: Current and avg. KPI-s. Expects 'get_load_average' and 'backends'  helpers to be installed on the monitored DB.

targets.query: select last("in_recovery_int") FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'in_recovery_int')::int
FROM
  wal
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time,
  (data->'postmaster_uptime_s')::int
FROM
  wal
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.description: Based on pg_stat_archiver. N/A when archiving is not enabled.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'is_failing_int')::int
FROM
  archiver
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: WAL archiving status

panels.description: Assumes get_wal_size helper being installed. 1/10 GB Warn / 50  Error  thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'wal_size_b')::float8
FROM
  wal_size
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: WAL folder size

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'numbackends')::int
FROM
  db_stats
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time,
  (data->'max_connections')::int
FROM
  settings
WHERE
  time > now() - '6h'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.query: SELECT last("idleintransaction") FROM "backends" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  avg((data->'waiting')::int)
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

targets.query: SELECT last("idleintransaction") FROM "backends" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'idleintransaction')::int
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.query: SELECT (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"))) * 100) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
  max((roll-roll_lag)::numeric / ((roll-roll_lag) + (comm-comm_lag)))*100 as "TX rollback ratio"
from (
  select
      time,
      (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
      (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag
  FROM
      db_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    window w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE comm > comm_lag or roll > roll_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.description: Transactions per Second. Last $online_interval average. <0.1 % Error / < 1.0 Warn thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("xact_rollback"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
  avg( ((roll-roll_lag) + (comm-comm_lag)) / extract(epoch from (time - time_lag))  )
from (
  select
      time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
      (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
      (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag
  FROM
      db_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    window w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE (comm > comm_lag or roll > roll_lag) and time > time_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: TPS (avg.)

panels.description: Queries per Second. Last $online_interval avg. < 0.1 Error / < 1 Warning thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
  avg( (c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as qps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.title: QPS (avg.)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'longest_query_seconds')::int
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.query: select sum("last") from (SELECT last("size_b") FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3650d) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'size_b')::int8
FROM
  db_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.query: select sum(diff) from (SELECT last("size_b")  - first("size_b") as diff FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(365d) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  last_value-first_value as size_diff
from (
  select
    time,
    first_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w,
    last_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w
  from
    db_size
  where 
    dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (
     order by time rows BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
  )
) x
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.description: Assumes get_psutil_disk wrapper being installed. 10/50GB Warn/Error thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT last("free") FROM psutil_disk WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND dir_or_tablespace = 'data_directory' GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  (data->'free')::int8
from
  psutil_disk
where 
  dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
  and tag_data->>'dir_or_tablespace' = 'data_directory'
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.title: DATADIR disk space left

panels.description: Last $online_interval avg. > 0.5s Warning / > 5s  Error thresholds by default

targets.query: select mean(q) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) as q FROM "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY queryid, time($__interval) fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
avg(case when c = c_lag then 0 else (tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag) end) as "avg_query_runtime"
from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c >= c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.title: Query runtime (avg.)

targets.query: SELECT count("event") FROM "configuration_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(*)
FROM
  configuration_changes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1

targets.query: SELECT count("event") FROM "table_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(*)
FROM
  table_changes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  (data->'checkpoints_req')::int
FROM
  bgwriter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time

targets.query: select sum(bloat) from (SELECT last("approx_free_space_b") as bloat FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'approx_free_space_b')::int8
FROM
  table_bloat_approx_summary
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.query: select sum("last") from (select last("is_invalid_int") from index_stats where "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter  group by "index_full_name")
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  sum((data->'is_invalid_int')::int)
FROM
  index_stats
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from index_stats where $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname')
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1

panels.description: NB! 'N/A' displayed both when no duplicate indexes or no metrics data for index_stats

targets.query: select count("count") from (select count("index_def") from (select last("index_def") as "index_def" from index_stats where "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  and $timeFilter  group by "table_full_name", "index_full_name", "index_def_hash") group by "table_full_name", "index_def_hash") where "count" > 1
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  coalesce(sum(count-1), 0)
FROM (
SELECT
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  data->>'index_def' as index_def,
  count(*)
FROM
  index_stats
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from index_stats where $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname')
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1, 2
HAVING count(*) > 1
) x

panels.title: Duplicate indexes

targets.query: SELECT mean("last") FROM (SELECT last("seconds_since_last_vacuum") FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND  table_size_b >  100000000 GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  avg(seconds_since_last_vacuum)
FROM (
SELECT
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8 as seconds_since_last_vacuum
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from table_stats where $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname')
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND (data->'table_size_b')::int8 > 100000000
) x

targets.query: SELECT mean("last") FROM (SELECT last("seconds_since_last_vacuum") FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND  table_size_b >  100000000 GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'longest_autovacuum_seconds')::int8 as longest_autovacuum_seconds
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND data ? 'longest_autovacuum_seconds'
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xlog_location_b"), 1s) FROM "wal" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  0 as time,
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / (etime-lag_etime)) as "WAL rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          extract(epoch from time) as etime,
          lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w as lag_etime,
          time
        from wal
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and etime > lag_etime

select
  0 as time,
  avg(case when tb-tb_lag > 0 then (tb-tb_lag) / (etime - lag_etime) else 0 end) as "Temp bytes (1h rate)"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag and etime > lag_etime

targets.query: select max("xmin_age_tx") from  (SELECT last("xmin_age_tx") as "xmin_age_tx" FROM "replication_slots" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d), slot_name fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
select
  0 as time,
  max(xmin) from (
SELECT
  max((data->'xmin_age_tx')::int8) as xmin
FROM
  replication_slots
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from replication_slots where time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval AND dbname = '$dbname')
  and dbname = '$dbname'  
UNION ALL
SELECT
  max((data->'max_xmin_age_tx')::int8) as xmin
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from backends where time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval AND dbname = '$dbname')
  and dbname = '$dbname'
) x

targets.query: select sum("last") from (select last("scans") from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("seq_scan"), 1m) as "scans" FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND table_size_b > 100000000 GROUP BY time($__interval), table_full_name fill(none)) group by table_full_name)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  sum((scan-scan_lag) * 60 / extract(epoch from (time-time_lag)))
FROM (
  SELECT
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
    (data->'seq_scan')::int8 as scan, lag((data->'seq_scan')::int8) over w as scan_lag
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    AND (data->'table_size_b')::int8 > 100000000
  WINDOW w AS (partition by tag_data->>'table_full_name' order by time)
) x
WHERE scan > scan_lag and time > time_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Seq. scans on >100 MB tables per minute (avg.)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_inserted"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(((ins-ins_lag) * 60) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_inserted"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(((ins-ins_lag) * 60) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_deleted"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(((del-del_lag) * 60) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->'tup_deleted')::int8 as del, lag((data->'tup_deleted')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where del >= del_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT
  0 as time,
  (data->'backup_duration_s')::int8
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  and dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT
  1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_updated"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql: select time, (data->'server_version_num')::int8 as value from settings where dbname = '$dbname' and time > now() - '6h'::interval order by time desc limit 1;

targets.query: SELECT ( non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_read")))) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  ((hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag)))*100 as "Shared buffers hit ratio"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag,
          time
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hit > hit_lag or read > read_lag
order by 1

targets.query: select sum(last) from (select last("non_active_int") FROM "replication_slots" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter  group by "slot_name")
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  sum((data->'non_active_int')::int)
FROM
  replication_slots
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from replication_slots where time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval AND dbname = '$dbname')
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

targets.query: select sum(last) from (select last("non_active_int") FROM "replication_slots" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter  group by "slot_name")
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  max((data->'replay_lag_b')::int8)
FROM
  replication
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.content: Brought to you by:

list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics ORDER BY 1;

title: Health-check
